item.title: Batch Processing with Argo Workflow
item.description: Batch Processing In this Chapter, we will deploy common batch processing scenarios using Kubernetes and Argo. What is Argo? Argo is an open source container-native workflow engine for getting work done on Kubernetes. Argo is implemented as a Kubernetes CRD (Custom Resource Definition). Define workflows where each step in the workflow is a container. Model multi-step workflows as a sequence of tasks or capture the dependencies between tasks using a graph (DAG).
